SIMPLE

SECURE

entry.title: 360 Vision PREDATOR 30N Analog Rugged PTZ Camera
entry.summary:
Vendor: 360 Vision Technology
Type: Camera
Price: 2299.00

360 PREDATOR Rugged High Resolution Analog PTZ Camera with 30X optical zoom

Designed and Manufactured in the United Kingdom!

PREDATOR features:

  • Multi Protocol integration: The PREDATOR comes with multi-protocols as standard allowing complete integration with many leading DVR’s, Matrices and IP systems (including 360 Vision, Pelco P/D/Coaxitron, BBV)
  • OSD: PREDATOR’s OSD enables full access to all functions using either 3rd party protocols or 360 Vision control systems.
  • Excellence in Design and Manufacture: The PREDATOR, like 360 Vision’s extensive VisionDome range, is driven by 360 Vision’s highly advanced motor control system, enabling extremely quiet, controllable and smooth with totally accurate operation and exact preset position selection.
  • Intelligent alarms module allows up to 144 alarm inputs which can be remotely configured via the Vision Matrix or any compatible 3rd party system.
  • Creative Privacy Zones are easily configurable with simple joystick positioning and sizing (up to 32 privacy zones).
  • Low light capability give usable video images as as low as 0.01 lux.
  • Colour/Mono cameras with ExView technology which gives excellent low light performance day or night.
  • Picture Freeze during preset where an on-screen visible image can be frozen whilst the PREDATOR moves to next preset positions allowing more efficient DVR recording.
  • Fast Shutter option for optimum performance with automatic number plate recognition systems.
  • Multiple Color Options available, including Black, White, or Cool Grey with Custom colors by request

PREDATOR options include: Pre-made cables of 3, 10, 25 and 40m, Wiper systems, Twin IR lamp, Wall, Corner and Post Mount brackets, Mounting adapter, PSU and Washer system. 

 

Datasheets/Literature


360 PREDATOR Sales Brochure
English - Français - Español

.

 

 Related Products:

  • 360 Predator Cameras and Accessories

entry.title: CheckMyCCTV CLOUD Automated CCTV System Status Monitoring Service for Central Stations
entry.summary:
Vendor: CheckMySystems
Type: Software
Price: 0.00

Offer CheckMyCCTV™ Automated CCTV System Status Monitoring Service for Central Stations to your customers as an additional subscription service to increase your service portfolio.

CheckMyCCTV™ CLOUD Service is a "Pay-As-You-Go" option aimed at Small to Medium sized security systems installers looking to offer enhanced services to their clients without any upfront hardware and infrastructure costs or long term commitment.

CheckMyCCTV™ for Central Stations offers a unique ability for Remote Monitoring Central Stations to offer their customers an automated testing and diagnostic solution to compliment their range of services. Along with ensuring your customers sites are secure, you will also be able to give them the assurance that their CCTV systems are operating correctly.

By using CheckMyCCTV™ for Central Stations to remotely monitor the health and operation of your customers’ CCTV installations, your business will benefit from:

  • Increased revenue streams
  • Your own brand solution.
  • Automated 24/7 Health Checking & Event Notification.
  • Customizable Daily/Weekly System Status Reports.
  • Fully scalable CLOUD and self-hosted solutions with low startup and running costs.

CheckMyCCTV™ is compatible with a wide range of CCTV Systems and brands available on the market and is an affordable, highly scalable solution for monitoring anywhere from a single location system to hundreds and thousands of sites.

Download the sales brochure

Téléchargez la brochure (bilingue)

See how CheckMyCCTV™ for Central Stations can work for you!

Contact us and we can discuss how you can become a CheckMyCCTV™ Monitoring Station Partner. We are offering Monitoring Stations a FREE 14-day trial, which we can remotely install and configure for you.

s:variant.title: CheckMyCCTV for Central Stations - FREE Trial

entry.title: CheckMyCCTV CLOUD Automated CCTV System Status Monitoring Service for Installers
entry.summary:
Vendor: CheckMySystems
Type: Software
Price: 0.00

Get alerted of system faults before they become critical using CheckMyCCTV™ CLOUD Services

CheckMyCCTV™ CLOUD Service is a "Pay-As-You-Go" option aimed at Small to Medium sized security systems installers looking to offer enhanced services to their clients without any upfront hardware and infrastructure costs or long term commitment.

Your customers invest in CCTV systems to help protect their staff, assets, and buildings… but are they working right now?

CheckMyCCTV™ CLOUD Service is the easiest and most cost effective way of offering your customers 24/7 system checking,

CheckMyCCTV™ CLOUD Service helps you:

  • Save Time, Money, and Energy by detecting and diagnosing issues remotely.
  • Improve your maintenance costs by supplementing a scheduled maintenance visit with 24/7 remote checking.
  • Improve your first visit fix rate.
  • Provide Proactive rather than Reactive maintenance support. View the status of all your installations at any time.

CheckMyCCTV CLOUD Service automatically and autonomously monitors your sites for issues with your CCTV System via our secure ISO 27001 certified Cloud Server, and reports them to you or any of of your designated contacts.

CheckMyCCTV is compatible with a wide range of CCTV Systems and brands available on the market and is an affordable, highly scalable solution for monitoring anywhere from a single location system to hundreds and thousands of sites.

Download the sales brochure

Téléchargez la brochure (bilingue)

Try before you buy offer: See how CheckMyCCTV can work for you!

For a limited time, order a No Charge, No Hassle, No Obligation 14-Day Trial to evaluate CheckMyCCTV with your own system.

Simply add the item to your Cart and follow the Checkout instructions. You will be contacted by one of our team members with instructions and assistance on getting started.

Note: Limited time offer available to qualified CCTV Installers or Monitoring Stations with primary business location in United States or Canada (excluding Quebec). One trial per customer. Other restrictions apply. Offer may end at any time without notice

entry.title: BR1-MINI-LTE 4G Cellular Modem with WiFi and GPS
entry.summary:
Vendor: IPX360 Solutions Inc
Type:
Price: 359.00

The BR1-Mini LTE cellular modem offers a small form factor — without sacrificing durability and reliability. Features:

Wide temperature range (-40° to +149°F / -40° to +65°C) and can be deployed in even the harshest environments.

Certified for vibration resistance and rolling stock (E Mark, EN 61373, EN 50155, EN 61000).

Multiple power inputs and a wide voltage range: DC Jack/Terminal Block: 12V – 28V DC; Passive PoE Input

Includes 2 redundant SIM slots, DC or terminal block power, remote management via InControl2 and GPS tracking.

Note: This items is available for sale to customers in Canada only

entry.title: Roemtech PMA345H Plenum Rated Stereo Amp/Mixer w/ built-in Hummbuster (B-Stock)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Roemtech
Type: Amplifiers
Price: 179.00

*** B-Stock - Condition: Showroom Demo/Like New ***

The PMA-350H is the newest addition to Roemtech's PlenumAmp line. This classroom audio system is a three input, 18 volt, 50 watt plenum rated mixer/amplifier. This Amplifier also features a green sleep mode, P/A override, and the much anticipated external volume control. Like the PMA-245H, the PMA-350H utilizes Roemtech's HummBuster technology which is switchable and flexible in resolving ground loop issues that may arise. Also included is our new RapidLock connecter for quick, easy installation. 
  • 50 Watt
  • Green Sleep Mode
  • P/A Override
  • External Volume Control
  • Proprietary HummBuster™ Technology
  • RapidLock Connector included 

Video demonstration of how to get rid of audio noise
in classroom audio systems using Roemtech's PMA-245H

entry.title: Roemtech PMA245H Plenum Rated 2-ch Amp/Mixer w/ Hummbuster
entry.summary:
Vendor: Roemtech
Type: Amplifiers
Price: 0.00

Roemtech Dealers, click here

The PMA-245H is a dual input, 18 volt, 45 watt, plenum rated stereo amplifier/mixer. It is ideal for above ceiling applications. The 5.43"W x 1.65"H x 4.8"D chassis dimensions allow three amplifiers to fit in one rack space. In addition, a uniquely designed heat-sink provides effective heat dissipation. The PMA-245H is intended for commercial and educational environments providing clear, crisp audio in a compact design. This new classroom audio system addition incorporates Roemtech's new Hummbuster Technology. This new technology is switchable allowing flexibility in resolving ground loop issues, should they arise.
 
  • 45 Watt
  • Proprietary HummBuster™ Technology
  • RapidLock Connector included

    in classroom audio systems using Roemtech's PMA-245H

entry.title: SC-360 Perimeter Surveillance Radar
entry.summary:
Vendor: IPX360 Solutions Inc
Type:
Price: 0.00

The SC-360 is a low-cost radar-based solution for wide area perimeter protection and intruder detection. With its 200m target detection range, a single SC-360 will protect an area of over 125,000 square meters, automatically slewing a PTZ camera to focus on the intruder and triggering an alarm.

The SC-360 perimeter surveillance radar incorporates innovative and advanced signal processing technology that allows the unit to learn about the environment it operates in and be programmed during the initial installation via laptop, to establish privacy zones.

  • Increases CCTV effectiveness by automatically detecting people and vehicles out to 200m range
  • Alarms on intrusion
  • Programmable surveillance areas up to 360 degrees
  • All weather capability
  • Low cost
  • Automatically slews and zooms the camera to the target
  • Compact design
  • Easy to install and set up
  • Flexible installation options
  • Configuration using web browser interface over IP network
  • ONVIF camera interface
  • IP interface and VMS integration

entry.title: SCAN-SECTOR Narrow Beam Static Radar Detector
entry.summary:
Vendor: IPX360 Solutions Inc
Type:
Price: 0.00

The Scan-Sector utilizes the same advanced technology as the SC360 used in the PREDATOR-Radar but offers a lower-cost solution in cases where 360° coverage isn't required. Ideal for protecting long corridors (e.g. between buildings) or for monitoring of a driveway or road.

  • Low cost, simple and quick installation and configuration
  • Alarms on intrusion
  • Up to 200m range
  • Can be high-mounted to avoid vandalism
  • Sophisticated beam shape minimises any 'creep zone' underneath the unit
  • All weather capability
  • Compact design
  • IP compatible solution with POE (Power Over Ethernet)
  • Advanced DSP signal processing for best target detection and minimal false alarms
  • 24GHz operating frequency for improved detection probability and immunity to jamming
  • Configurable maximum detection range

entry.title: PREDATOR-TX HD Heavy Duty Wireless 4G/LTE PTZ HD Camera System
entry.summary:
Vendor: 360 Vision Technology
Type: Camera
Price: 0.00

The PREDATOR-TX wireless 4G/LTE 'all-in-one' complete CCTV surveillance camera system solution with edge recording capacity and wireless transmission, ideally suited for public safety, crowd management and unattended site or asset protection

The PREDATOR-TX provides a reliable wireless video transmission solution using highly efficient video compression with unique minimal latency for optimal performance in difficult wireless video transmission environments,

Suitable for rapid, temporary or permanent deployment applications, the ultra-reliable
TX Range offers an integrated ‘Plug & Play’ surveillance solution with easy setup. Simply insert any data SIM card (cellular version), add power and the device is ready to go, connecting the moment it is switched on.

With complete control of bandwidth used, you can choose the resolution and frame rate to transmit, dependent on the bandwidth available. Switch dynamically between low and high bandwidth video streams, dependent on networks capability, adjusting video quality to suit.

With the latest optimized video compression and unique, low latency transmission technology – which is fully encrypted and secure, users can be assured of dependable performance.

entry.title: Scanforce Invisible Metal Detector Gloves
entry.summary:
Vendor: PROD360
Type: Security Alert Devices
Price: 399.00

Identify and locate hidden and concealed metal objects on people during routine and unplanned physical searches without physical contact.

  • Will detect a handgun, a knife or small metal object the size of a paper clip at distance of 4 to 5 cm
  • Discrete warning: during the search, a vibration discretely warns the wearer and not the person being checked.
  • Long autonomy - 3 weeks for detection*; Automatic switch to standby mode.
  • Palm & back made of cut resistant ZIRNIUM® weave technology for optimum protection from knives or or blades combined with enhanced comfort, dexterity and durability. 
  • Perfectly adapted to all security check and control applications (concerts, sporting and public events, detention facilities)
  • Sold in pairs (for Left and Right hand)

See also:

 Invisible Metal Detector Bracelet

 

 

We offer special discounts on our range of metal detector gloves and bracelets to law enforcement and correctional services officers, firefighters, paramedics, and emergency medical technicians. Contact us for more information and to receive your unique discount code to be used at Checkout

entry.title: Roemtech PMA245+HMB Plenum Rated Amplifier + External HummBuster Kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: Roemtech
Type: Amplifiers
Price: 129.00

Kit includes one PMA-245 Plenum Rated Amplifier and one HMB-200 External Hummbuster
The PMA-245 is a dual input, 18 volt, 45 watt, plenum rated stereo amplifier/mixer. It is ideal for above ceiling applications. The PMA-245 delivers a true 45 watts of power and will give even the largest classrooms the audio clarity needed. In many environments, ambient background noise such as HVAC systems and hallway traffic is an issue. With the PMA-245, these issues won't overpower your sound system.
The HMB-200 HummBuster has been engineered to remove ground loop issues from classroom audio systems. This issue typically manifests itself as a hum or a buzz within the audio system.
 

   download pdf brochure
 

      Find a Roemtech Distributor / Reseller

entry.title: DW-HDSPOTMOD16 16-channel Spot monitoring module (B-STOCK)
entry.summary:
Vendor: IPX360 Solutions Inc
Type:
Price: 329.00

*** B-stock/Open Box unit in new condition, used for internal testing purposes in our tech center. Fully tested and updated with latest available firmware ***

The DW-HDSPOTMOD16 16-channel Spot monitoring module lets you directly view up to 16 HD cameras at a time without connecting to them through a PC or server, automatically searching the network and identifying an unlimited number of ONVIF conformant IP cameras for local monitoring.

Ideal for providing public views in retail and office  environments, as well as live monitoring stations for security personnel.

entry.title: IBV PRO Grade 1080P HD WiFi Video Doorbell
entry.summary:
Vendor: Napco IBV
Type: Camera
Price: 129.00

The IBV Professional Grade HD Video Doorbell easily connects to your home or office WiFi network and existing doorbell wiring & chime box - Let's you see who's at the door, watch for deliveries, screen guests, look out for potential thieves & more

Features:

  • HD Video with two-way talk & noise-cancellation
  • Built-in PIR with customizable motion detection zones
  • Day & Night Live-View & archived video with infrared night vision
  • Instant alerts to mobile device when visitors press the doorbell or trigger the built-in motion sensors
  • Time/date-stamped video is also cloud-archived for later review
  • Hear and speak to anyone at the door from any smartphone, tablet or PC using free Apps on iTunes®/Google Play®
  • Slim, durable & weather-resistant, IP-65 Rated enclosure fits virtually anywhere
  • Easy installation - Works with existing mechanical/electronic chime boxes using doorbell power & wiring, with quick 2-wire AC installation.
  • Configure using smartphone or tablet
  • 12-months. cloud-based video storage included
